column4: i have just installed ubuntu 7.10 ,How can i make sure that my installtion was ok ?
i have just installed ubuntu 7.10 ,How can i make sure that my installtion was ok ?
any special problems to report?
unless you tell us the message there is not much to be done
unless you have some serious problems no
outside of providing specific information or encountering serious problems, likely no--this is not windows :}
the ose one does not
get the one from their website
thanks
the ose or the one from their site
: i've follow a lot of HOW-TOs ,it's not working with me .
you need to specify the exact errors you got; as I said the ose does not support that

that is not info to help us

which step is 'not working'

how did you try starting it

that is the one that does not support usb
